title: Club Seabourne - 5th Night Free
description: Book 5 days / 4 nights and receive the 5th night FREE. This offer is for double occupancy in Deluxe Villa, daily a la carte breakfast, and use of kayaks.
fullDescription: Book 5 days / 4 nights and receive the 5th night FREE. This offer is for double occupancy in Deluxe Villa, daily a la carte breakfast, use of kayaks at Fulladoza Bay and Dakiti Reef, bicycles for adults, towels for beach and pool, and transfers in Culebra Island (from airport or ferry to hotel). Min 4 nights stay .9% Room Tax applies per night and is not included in the package price. Not valid with other offers.
highlights: - Incredible location in the island of Culebra

title: Copa Marina - Early Bird Special
description: Secluded beachfront resort with lush gardens, pools, outdoor dining, and live music. Close to nature sites and activities like kayaking and snorkeling.
fullDescription: Based on single and double occupancy. An additional fee will apply for the third and fourth person over twelve years old. Maximum occupancy of four persons per room. Early Bird Special is fully prepaid and non-refundable. Rates may vary and are subject to availability. Cannot be combined with other offers, promotions or discounts. Not valid for groups. Subject to availability. Blackout dates and other restrictions may apply. Must book 60 days in advance.
highlights: - Short drive to one of our favorite beaches in Puerto Rico

title: Gallery Inn Hotel - 50% off your 3rd night
description: Book 2 consecutive nights and get 50% off your 3rd night.
fullDescription: Stay for 2 consecutive nights, and get 50% off your rate for the 3rd consecutive night.
highlights: - This hotel boasts a prime location in Old San Juan, offering stunning ocean views.
- The owner, an artist herself, has meticulously preserved the building’s historic character, creating a truly otherworldly experience for guests.
- Words fall short when describing the sheer beauty of this property. No, really—we’re speechless.
terms: Promotional rates are for stays between May 1 - October 31, 2025 with a minimum 2 night length of stay. Blackout dates apply. Package pricing based on two adults and does not include taxes, gratuity or daily resort fee. Subject to availability. Promotion cannot be combined with any other offer, sale promotion, or prior purchase/reservation. Refunds will not be issued for any part of the package not used. The first night of your stay is charged as deposit at the time of your reservation. The cancellation policy for any reservation at the resort is 5 days prior to arrival.  Late cancellations forfeit one night's room rate, resort fee and tax.

title: Hotel Stay at 4.5-Star The Royal Sonesta San Juan Resort
description: The Royal Sonesta San Juan is a luxurious 4.5-star oceanfront resort in Puerto Rico with stunning views of Isla Verde beach.
fullDescription:
This deal includes:

- Stay for two in a city-view deluxe king room, city-view deluxe double-queen room, ocean-view king room, or ocean-view two-double room
- Daily breakfast buffet for two
- Complimentary basic wireless internet
- Complimentary coffee/tea service replenished daily
- Use of 24-hour fitness center
- Chaise and towel service at the pool and beach

title: Meat Market Restaurant - Pay $50 for a $100 Gift Card
description: $49 for $100 - Meat Market is a steakhouse located inside the Fairmont Hotel in San Juan.
fullDescription: Meat Market offers a variety of Prime cuts, appetizers, and an outstanding Wine Spectator–award-winning premium wine list, all with an artistic and contemporary twist.

description:
- Up to 20% rate discount

terms: Valid for bookings until October 20, 2025, for stays between September 1st, 2025 until December 20, 2025. Rate displayed upon booking already reflects discount. Minimum stay of two (2) consecutive nights required. Shortening the stay will result in rate change to that arrival dates.
fullDescription:

title: Spa Package Caribe Hilton - San Juan
description: Package includes two 55‑minute spa treatments (choice of Swedish, Deep‑Tissue, Lymphatic massage, deep‑pore cleansing facial or body exfoliation) plus 25 % off additional services
fullDescription:
The ultimate spa-cation awaits at the positively paradise Caribe Hilton with two (2) spa treatments at Zen Spa Océano included in your stay.

Enjoy two (2) 55-minute spa treatments of your choice and buff away dull looking skin or escape from your stresses with the signature Zenssage®, including aromatherapy calming effects for your mind, body and soul.

Choose from:

- Swedish, Deep Tissue or Lymphatic Massage
- Deep-Pore Cleansing Facial
- Body Exfoliation

Feel the need for more pampering?  Enjoy 25% off additional services such as, a massage, facial, body scrub or nail services, at Zen Spa Océano when reserving this package.

title: Brunch for Two – Blessed Mornings - Fajardo
description: $18 instead of $37 for two brunch dishes (choice of French‑toast sandwich, red‑velvet waffles, pancake tacos or Romanos omelette) and two 8 oz lattes/cappuccinos
fullDescription: $18 instead of $37 for two brunch dishes (choice of French‑toast sandwich, red‑velvet waffles, pancake tacos or Romanos omelette) and two 8 oz lattes/cappuccinos

title: Enterprise Rent‑A‑Car – Up to 15 % off base rate
description: Save 10 % on economy–full‑size vehicles and 15 % on other car classes when renting for three days or more
fullDescription: Offer applies to rentals picked up between Aug 18 2025 and Dec 15 2025 and returned by Dec 28 2025; 3‑day minimum and 27‑day maximum; discount applies to base rate only (time & mileage) and excludes taxes, fees and optional services. Not valid on exotic or cargo vehicles.

title: $60 for a 6-Hour Nature Adventure - Utuado
description: 6-Hour Adventure, Including: 4x4 Transportation at Tamana Forest + Tour to Explore Tunnels and Caves + Cave Tubing on the Longest Route in the Tanamá
fullDescription: $60 for a 6-Hour Adventure, Including: 4x4 Transportation at Tamana Forest + Tour to Explore Tunnels and Caves + Cave Tubing on the Longest Route in the Tanamá + Photography and Video Service + Lifejacket + Protective Helmet and Flashlight + Interpreter Guide (Check Out Details in ‘The Experience’)
